firstTime.title: Privacy Policy
firstTime.intro: To use Step-Wise, you must approve of the Privacy Policy. In short:
firstTime.list:
• We use cookies only for sign-in and site settings purposes. No tracking/ads.
  • We won't share personal identifiable data with others unless after specific approval.
  • You can always remove all your data by deleting your account.

update.title: Privacy Policy Update
update.intro: Our Privacy Policy has been updated. To continue using Step-Wise, you must approve of this version.
